text: tilke-rrusulu feddalna ba`dahum `ala ba`d. minhum men kelleme-llahu verafe`a ba`dahum deracat. veateyna `ise-bne meryeme-lbeyyinati veeyyednahu biruhi-lkudus. velev sae-llahu me-ktetele-llezine mim ba`dihim mim ba`di ma caethumu-lbeyyinatu velakini-htelefu feminhum men amene veminhum men kefer. velev sae-llahu me-ktetelu velakinne-llahe yef`alu ma yurid
